summary: Mojang Studios is a video game company from Sweden. They made the super popular game Minecraft, which is the best-selling game ever! The studio was started by Markus Persson in 2009. After Minecraft became a big hit, the company was bought by Microsoft in 2014. Since then, they've made more Minecraft games and a few other titles. Mojang now has around 600 employees and is led by Ã…sa Bredin.
title: Mojang Studios
